name: Lost Souls - Ludum Dare 46
description:
Headphones recommended for the most immersive experience! 🎶 NOTE: If you see a black box over the torch or bonfire instead of fire, it's due to some problems with the web player version. In that case, consider downloading the Windows or Mac files to play the game as originally intended. Thank you for playing our game! We wish you a safe journey among the lost souls.

Ludum Dare 46 entry link => https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/lost-souls

             Dear Wanderer,

             If you’re reading this, I am probably that pile of bones sitting next to my old fire. I don’t know who you are or how you got here, but let me tell you this: You’ll regret coming here. It’s a fine place in the daylight – the sun hanging low over the ponds, a beautiful scene. When the clock strikes midnight, though, it’s a different story. The souls of the damned lurk the shadows, I tell you. You’ll see them soon enough. They’ll find you and take you among their ranks, and I’ll warn you this: They will get to you. I was hopeful of escape at first as well, but there’s no way out. Only prolonging the wait to your inevitable demise. I can’t help you. Nobody can. 

             What I can give you are what shall be remembered as my last words – Stay in the light. The Souls knock the trees enough that you’ll find the occasional piece of wood, and I advise you use it, keep a fire going, fashion a torch, anything you can do, you must. I made fires as well, they’re scattered throughout here, but I’ve tried to fashion paths to find my way back to them. Sometimes, one of the Damned will be freed, and they’ll leave their last gifts upon the ground. Listen closely to the tune of their salvation, and you’ll be able to hunt their treasures down.

I hope you had a good life.

Sincerely, 

               Lieut. James Longstreet
